welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tallmadge, the charming and historic city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore our city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton International Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fulton International Airport handles all air freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Akron/canton Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights operated by American Airlines and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines and Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
